medical_history.chief_complaint: Severe psychomotor retardation and hypotonia, hospitalized for malnutrition.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient has experienced severely disturbed mental development since birth, with inability to speak or show significant reactions. Hypotonia has made it impossible for the patient to stand, sit without support, or keep his head upright. Symptoms have persisted, and treatment with oral overfeeding was unsuccessful.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Missense mutation (812G>A, Arg271His) of the MCT8 gene identified. No prior surgeries or other medical conditions specified.
medical_history.family_history: Both mother and one of his three sisters are carriers of MCT8 mutation.
